name: alameda-election-2025-proposition-50
description: Interactive map showing Proposition 50 vote results by precinct in Alameda County

scripts.dev:kill: lsof -ti:8000 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true; pkill -f 'tsc --watch' 2>/dev/null || true; pkill -f 'http-server' 2>/dev/null || true; echo 'Killed all dev servers'
